page.title: 15ENTERTAINMENT IN NW NEWBURY
page.content: {LOCAL THEATRE:WATERMILL THEATRE}is only local professional theatre in area.Sited at{Bagnor}in rebuilt watermill on {R.Lambourn;}mentioned in Domesday 1,then valued at Â£4. {THEATRE ORGANISATION:}Seats 179;top ticket price(1985),Â£7.50.{Actors} employed for 7 wk season including rehearsals.Audience drawn from roughly 20ml radius.Restaurant & licensed bar on site.Grounds cover 0.75 acres. Tie-in with some local hotels for provision of accommodation if required.Small cast plays/revues performed also one night concerts.Aims to provide 6-7 productions per season + Christmas prod. {THEATRE RUNNING COSTS}Approx Â£160,000 p.a.Theatre relies on grants from local council etc. {SHAW SOCIAL CLUB}venue for dances and other activities for members & friends
